text:
{"fixed_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
  <DESCRIPTION>In der Hoch-Obrigkeitl. Buchtruckerey zu Bern und folgende Bücher in gar geringem Preiß zu haben, als:</DESCRIPTION>
  <BIBL>
    <NUMBER>1.</NUMBER>
    <AUTHOR>J. H Ringieri</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>CX. Conciones de Coena Dominic.</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>3. Vol.</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1680</YEAR>
    <NOTE>das Exemplar in albo achthalben</NOTE>
    <PRIZE>bz.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <NUMBER>2.</NUMBER>
    <AUTHOR>Rissenii</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Summa Theolog.</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>in 8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1703</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>10. Batzen,</PRIZE>
    <NOTE>und auff Schreib-papier</NOTE>
    <PRIZE>14. Batzen.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <NUMBER>3.</NUMBER>
    <AUTHOR>Rodolphi</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Compend. Theol. Christ</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1713</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>8 Batzen.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <NUMBER>4.</NUMBER>
    <AUTHOR>Altmanns</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Catechetischer Leerbüchlein und Rauchwerck, d. i. Erklärung und Gebätt über den Heydelbergischen Catechismum,</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern,</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1711</YEAR>
    <NOTE>mit dem Kupffer-Blatt haltet 15. und ein halben Bogen,</NOTE>
    <PRIZE>5. Batzen.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <NUMBER>5.</NUMBER>
    <TITLE>Biblia Piscatoris</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>in 4to.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Rein,</PLACE>
    <PRIZE>15. Batzen.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <NUMBER>6.</NUMBER>
    <AUTHOR>Seelmatters</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Ewig-vest-bestehender Berg Zion, oder: der vest-gegründete unverwindliche Gnaden-Stand der Kinderen GOttes,</TITLE>
    <NOTE>gründlich vorgestellt über die Worte des 125. Pfalms 9. 1.</NOTE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1704</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>5. Batzen.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":12,"explanation":"1. Added XML declaration for proper XML formatting. 2. Wrapped introductory text in a <DESCRIPTION> tag. 3. Fixed corrupted Unicode characters (e.g., \u221a\u00bacher → Bücher, \u221a\u00bachter → Leerbüchlein). 4. Separated each bibliographic entry into distinct <BIBL> elements. 5. Added <NUMBER> tags for each entry's numbering. 6. Fixed malformed <PRIZE> tag in the last entry (was <PRICE>). 7. Wrapped miscellaneous notes in <NOTE> tags for consistency. 8. Ensured all <BIBL> elements are properly nested and closed. 9. Removed stray Unicode characters (e.g., \u221a\u2020) that were not part of the content. 10. Corrected the structure of the 6th entry, which had text outside tags. 11. Standardized the format of special characters (e.g., ß, ü). 12. Ensured all tags are properly opened and closed."}

parsed.fixed_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
  <DESCRIPTION>In der Hoch-Obrigkeitl. Buchtruckerey zu Bern und folgende Bücher in gar geringem Preiß zu haben, als:</DESCRIPTION>
  <BIBL>
    <NUMBER>1.</NUMBER>
    <AUTHOR>J. H Ringieri</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>CX. Conciones de Coena Dominic.</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>3. Vol.</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1680</YEAR>
    <NOTE>das Exemplar in albo achthalben</NOTE>
    <PRIZE>bz.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <NUMBER>2.</NUMBER>
    <AUTHOR>Rissenii</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Summa Theolog.</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>in 8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1703</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>10. Batzen,</PRIZE>
    <NOTE>und auff Schreib-papier</NOTE>
    <PRIZE>14. Batzen.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <NUMBER>3.</NUMBER>
    <AUTHOR>Rodolphi</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Compend. Theol. Christ</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1713</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>8 Batzen.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <NUMBER>4.</NUMBER>
    <AUTHOR>Altmanns</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Catechetischer Leerbüchlein und Rauchwerck, d. i. Erklärung und Gebätt über den Heydelbergischen Catechismum,</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern,</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1711</YEAR>
    <NOTE>mit dem Kupffer-Blatt haltet 15. und ein halben Bogen,</NOTE>
    <PRIZE>5. Batzen.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <NUMBER>5.</NUMBER>
    <TITLE>Biblia Piscatoris</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>in 4to.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Rein,</PLACE>
    <PRIZE>15. Batzen.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <NUMBER>6.</NUMBER>
    <AUTHOR>Seelmatters</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Ewig-vest-bestehender Berg Zion, oder: der vest-gegründete unverwindliche Gnaden-Stand der Kinderen GOttes,</TITLE>
    <NOTE>gründlich vorgestellt über die Worte des 125. Pfalms 9. 1.</NOTE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1704</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>5. Batzen.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>
parsed.explanation: 1. Added XML declaration for proper XML formatting. 2. Wrapped introductory text in a <DESCRIPTION> tag. 3. Fixed corrupted Unicode characters (e.g., \u221a\u00bacher → Bücher, \u221a\u00bachter → Leerbüchlein). 4. Separated each bibliographic entry into distinct <BIBL> elements. 5. Added <NUMBER> tags for each entry's numbering. 6. Fixed malformed <PRIZE> tag in the last entry (was <PRICE>). 7. Wrapped miscellaneous notes in <NOTE> tags for consistency. 8. Ensured all <BIBL> elements are properly nested and closed. 9. Removed stray Unicode characters (e.g., \u221a\u2020) that were not part of the content. 10. Corrected the structure of the 6th entry, which had text outside tags. 11. Standardized the format of special characters (e.g., ß, ü). 12. Ensured all tags are properly opened and closed.
